thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Ann-Catrin Karlgren
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Ann-Catrin Karlgren

author: Ann-Catrin Karlgren
title: Ann-Catrin Karlgren
text:
The clothes are true to size per the table and the delivery is the speed of lightning. I ordered on the weekend and the parcel was ready for delivery wednesday morning, There is an option to change the delivery if you for some reason isnt home at that time. I changed mine with the click of a button,
I will definitely order from you again
